title: Kadhal Oviyam Lyrics Alaigal Oivathillai
stanzas:
kadhal oviyam
paadum kaaviyam
thaen sindhum
poonjolai nam raajiyam
endrum aanandham
perinbam dheiveegam.

oh ho

thaedinen o o 
en jeevane
thendralile mithandhu
varum thaen malare

neeyum naayagan
kadhal paadagan
anbil oadi inbam
kodi endrum kaanalaam.
